amendment.description: Amendment sought to establish uniform standards for States to use to inform the public when the water quality at public beaches fails to meet minimum safety standards.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 44 in the Congressional Record of May 9) to establish uniform standards for states to use to inform the public when the water quality at public beaches fails to meet minimum safety standards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 251 (Roll no. 317).
